name: BINKY XXV: Binky Versus the Brain
name_original: BINKY XXV: Binky Versus the Brain
description:
If you have the time, please read "onMasterSlaveAndGodotDevelopers" in txt or pdf formats

The twenty fifth in the award winning BINKY series!

At the theatre... an evil BRAIN challenges BINKY to a game of wits: Will you survive?

Controls:

Arrows or WASD - move

esc - quit

Credits:

chorus from Klik&Play

rocket from Klik&Play

Ambrogio de Predis - young blonde woman facing left

Casserius, Tabulae Anatomicae.

Hieronymus Bosch - The Conjurer

oof sfx from roblox (actually from messiah)

Music:

Daedelus by Tsukasa Masuko
